author: Yuliya Chernova
title: Joshua Kushner’s Oscar Health Seeks Validation—and Higher Valuation
text:
Oscar Health Insurance Corp., the health insurance startup co-founded by Joshua Kushner, is moving to put a difficult chapter behind it by starting a new round of fundraising at a higher valuation, according to two people familiar with the matter.
The New York-based company went through a period of uncertainty while Washington threatened to repeal the Affordable Care Act, on which Oscar’s business was developed. Some of the legislative limbo has been cleared up, just in time for the company’s new pitch to investors.
...
